title: Pizzagalli Terrazzo Tuile & Marbre Inc.
description:
Letterhead with 5 lines of red text and a checkerboard pattern in shades of green and red. 
1st line: Light red square. 2nd line: Dark green square to the left of square above. 3rd line: Pizzagalli Terrazzo Tuile & Marbre Inc. in red text with first letters of first two words in red square in white text. 4th line: a light green square followed by a dark green square to the right in red text: Manufacturiers Enterpreneurs Importateurs. 5th line: 105 West, Rue Jean-Talon Montreal 10 Quebec 179-6361

3 seals are printed vertically in light green towards bottom left: 
The Montreal Consruction Association's seal consists of a large C surrounding 3 small A's. 
the Seal of The National Terrazzo and Mosaic Association consists of text encircling a person at a worktable. 
The seal of the Terrazzo, Tile, and Marble Association of Canada is 3 three ovals representing the textures of the materials. 

At bottom in light green text: Contrats subordonnes aux greves et evenements imprevisbles. Cotations sujettes a proupte acceptation.
name: letterhead
